parse.title: List of parks and gardens in Paris

text.*:
See also: History of Parks and Gardens of Paris
Map of green spaces in Paris.

Paris, France today has more than 421 municipal parks and gardens, covering more than three thousand hectares and containing more than 250,000 trees.[1][verification needed] The following is a list of public parks and gardens in the city.

Contents

  • 1 Woodlands
  • 2 Parks
  • 3 Gardens
  • 4 Promenades
  • 5 Notes and citations
